summary: A male two-handed swordman Redguard companion.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/34800-1-1365971627.png[/img]

Galen is a male Redguard warrior. You could already meet him [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34800/?]here.[/url]

Now he is standalone with more flavors - that I'm planning on improving.
This also means, any ideas or offer to help is more than welcomed!

[color=#ff0000][size=4]Now he can be a vampire too![/size][/color] (You'll need Dawnguard DLC for the 4th version.)

You can still find him in DragonBridge, in the Four Shields Tavern.
He starts with 3 different outfits - each style with a different one - but he always has a Steel Greatsword.
He is essential and you can marry him.
He is using FS's naked body meshes.
If his follower dialogue lines do not show up right away, make a quicksave-quickload and they'll be there. Usually it works if you let him finish up his talking too...
[color=#ff0000]
[size=4]The Triplets arrived![/size][/color]
You can find them in Morthal, in the Moorside Inn.

Galen is a two-handed warrior with a steel greatsword.
Gavin is a swordman with a steel blade and steel shield.
Devlin is a dualwielder with steel swords.

They are triplets, with different hairstyle, eyecolor, outfits, skills, weapons and scars.
They even have different voices.

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60580-1-1417967254.png[/img]
[center][/center][i][u]To install:[/u][/i]

After the extraction of the file just copy the files into Data folder. Then activate the esp in the launcher.
I also tried to make him NMM compatible, if there is a problem, please tell me.


[i][u]Compatibility:[/u][/i]

This mod should not conflict with anything. Reason is, he has no scripts this time.
This also means he is a simple follower without quest, 'cause I'm not good at that. (Any help is welcomed to change that...)
He works fine with UFO and should work with Amazing Follower Tweaks too.

[i][u]
Changelog:[/u][/i]

1.1a
Under the optional files, the Triplets can have Schlongs of Skyrim compatibility - brave ones should try out and tell me if works...
1.1
Triplets had been uploaded.
v1-v3 main files moved to optional.
1.0 v4
Vampire style had been uploaded.
1.0 v1-v3
First 3 styles had been uploaded.


[i][u]Recommended:[/u][/i]

or

author: Yyna
